name: BAKED:MAGIC demo
description:
BAKED:MAGIC

[Fantasy, Romance, GxG]

THIS IS A SHORT DEMO

The story of a bakery, two witches, a knight, and some muffins. 

BAKED:MAGIC is a light-hearted story about Lana, a witch that owns a bakery. 
She recently took on an apprentice that is eager to learn how to bake delicious muffins using magic. 
They are frequented by their 'number 1 customer' who is a royal knight. 
Learn how Lana deals with love, life, rejection, and acceptance. 
Play through the four days of her life ending with a single big event.

Credits:

Writing and Coding: Red
Art: Red (w/ resources from Freepik.com)
Music: Shoko (& extra tracks from Tim Reichert & Kevin MacLeod)
SFX: Diatonicnerds

Special thanks to the following for help with coding, art advice, beta testing, and more:
Ertal, Aleema, Diatonicnerds, Timepatches, various people from the Ren'Py discord chat
